title: Create LICENSE and CONTRIBUTING.md
description: Add open-source LICENSE file (MIT or Apache-2.0) and CONTRIBUTING.md with guidelines for: code style, testing requirements, PR process, code of conduct, and development setup instructions.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Created LICENSE and CONTRIBUTING.md files:

**LICENSE (Apache-2.0):**
- Full Apache License 2.0 text
- Copyright 2025 GoatBytes.IO
- Updated pyproject.toml license fields (PEP 621 and Poetry)
- Updated package __license__ metadata
- Updated PyPI classifier to Apache Software License

**CONTRIBUTING.md:**
- Used provided contributor template
- CLA requirement with Google Forms link
- Fork and pull request workflow
- Review process explanation
- Encouragement for community engagement

**Verification:**
- All tests passing with updated license
- License metadata consistent across all files
